plot: An extraterrestrial virus breaches the Earth's atmosphere, creating a giant bug-eyed monster which a team of physicists must destroy at any cost.
title: Black Colossus
plot_es: An extraterrestrial virus breaches the Earth's atmosphere, creating a giant bug-eyed monster which a team of physicists must destroy at any cost.
plot_en: An extraterrestrial virus breaches the Earth's atmosphere, creating a giant bug-eyed monster which a team of physicists must destroy at any cost.
